config.title: Andrea Novel Helper Settings
config.rolesFile.description: Path to the roles JSON file (relative to workspace root)
config.sensitiveWordsFile.description: Path to the sensitive words JSON file (relative to workspace root)
config.vocabularyFile.description: Path to the vocabulary JSON file (relative to workspace root)
config.regexPatternsFile.description: Path to the regex patterns JSON file (relative to workspace root)
config.outlinePath.description: Path to the outline directory (relative to workspace root)
config.minChars.description: Minimum number of prefix characters to trigger completion
config.markdownToolbarHeight.description: Height of the Markdown toolbar (in pixels)
sidebar.anh.title: Andrea Novel Helper
command.openTimeStats.title: ANH:Open Time Stats
command.exportTimeStatsCSV.title: ANH:Export Time Stats CSV
config.timeStats.enabledLanguages.descri: Language IDs to track writing statistics (default: markdown, plaintext).
config.timeStats.idleThresholdMs.descrip: Idle threshold in milliseconds for writing statistics; inactivity above this stops counting (default: 30000).
config.timeStats.bucketSizeMs.descriptio: Time bucket size in milliseconds for CPM calculation (default: 60000).
config.timeStats.imeDebounceMs.descripti: IME debounce time in milliseconds to avoid false statistics during Chinese input (default: 350).
config.timeStats.respectWcignore.descrip: Whether writing time stats respect .wcignore (default false: only .gitignore; when true, ignored files produce no time stats).
config.timeStats.exitIdleOn.description: Condition to exit idle state (default: text change only).
config.timeStats.exitIdleOn.textChange: Exit idle state only on text changes
config.timeStats.exitIdleOn.windowFocus: Exit idle state on window focus or text changes
config.timeStats.exitIdleOn.editorChange: Exit idle state on editor switch, window focus, or text changes
config.fileTracker.respectWcignore.descr: (File Tracking only) Whether file tracking respects .wcignore ignore rules (default: false; only .gitignore). Writing time stats do not use this flag.
command.showFileTrackingStats.title: ANH:Show File Tracking Statistics
command.cleanupMissingFiles.title: ANH:Cleanup Missing Files
command.exportTrackingData.title: ANH:Export Tracking Data
config.fileTracker.writeLegacySnapshot.d: Whether to emit legacy aggregated file-tracking.json snapshot (debug / external tools).
config.outline.lazyMode.description: Enable lazy outline generation: do not create/refresh outline files until an outline editor is opened.
config.timeStats.persistReadOnlySessions: Persist read-only sessions (no char changes). If false, pure reading won't touch the tracking DB.
config.timeStats.statusBar.alignment.des: Status bar location for time stats (left/right). Recreate item on change.
config.timeStats.statusBar.alignment.lef: Show on left side of status bar
config.timeStats.statusBar.alignment.rig: Show on right side of status bar
config.timeStats.statusBar.priority.desc: Status bar priority (higher appears more to the left/right within its alignment group).

config.workspaceDisabled.description: Disable all Andrea Novel Helper features in this workspace (acts as a soft kill switch).
WordCount: Show index prefix in label while in manual ordering mode.
config.wordCount.order.padWidth.descript: WordCount: Zero-pad width for index (0 disables).
config.wordCount.order.autoResequence.de: WordCount: Auto resequence all indices when gaps exhausted.
config.wordCount.debug.description: WordCount: Enable verbose debug logging (console). Use only for diagnosing issues; may impact performance.
